name: Cloyster
flavorText:
When attacked, it
launches its
horns in quick volleys. Its
innards have
never been seen.

previous.name: Shellder
previous.flavorText:
Its hard shell
repels any kind
of attack. It is vulnerable
only when its
shell is open.

next.name: Gastly
next.flavorText:
Almost invisible,
this gaseous
POKéMON cloaks the target and
puts it to sleep
without notice.
